metadata.title: CVE-2016-0827 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple integer overflows in libeffects in mediaserver in Android 4.xbefore 4.4.4, 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY49H, and 6.x before 2016-03-01 allowattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, as demonstrated byobtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access, related toEffectBundle.cpp and EffectReverb.cpp, aka internal bug 26347509.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
